messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] (unknown)
messages.msgSnippet: ... One of the best primary sources is surely Musashi s A Book of Five Rings. Apart from Nitobe s  Bushido (a must, of course), I would check out Okakura s
messages.messageBody:
On Nov 30, 2003, at 2:27 AM, jason pujol wrote:

> Hello, I'm Xak j.Pujol and I'm from Barcelona, Spain.
> I am doing a research project on Bushido, and besides the books I have
> about it, I can't find much information.
> I've read in samuraihistory message search and I found a few things,
> but I would also like to know about Bushido nowadays.
> Does somebody know a website(or any other place) where I can find more
> information?
>
> Thank you in advance,
>
> Xak.J.Pujol

One of the best primary sources is surely Musashi's "A Book of Five
Rings." Apart from Nitobe's "Bushido" (a must, of course), I would
check out Okakura's "The Ideals of the East."
Buena Suerte

cepo, Honolulu


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Hey hey
messages.msgSnippet: ... have ... Well, you might want to look at the Book: Bushido: The Soul of Japan...i think you ll find that very interesting, here are some links:
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, jason pujol <xak@b...> wrote:
> Hello, I'm Xak j.Pujol and I'm from Barcelona, Spain.
> I am doing a research project on Bushido, and besides the books I
have
> about it, I can't find much information.

Well, you might want to look at the Book: Bushido: The Soul of
Japan...i think you'll find that very interesting, here are some
links:

http://www.koryubooks.com/library/kfriday2.html --History of Bushido

> http://www.sacred-texts.com/shi/bsd/index.htm--On-line text of
Bushido: The Soul of Japan...very informative, intersting quotes

I hope this helps you! Ciao and Good luck!
>
> _____________________________________________________________

messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I m Xak j.Pujol and I m from Barcelona, Spain. I am doing a research project on Bushido, and besides the books I have about it, I can t find much
messages.messageBody:
Hello, I'm Xak j.Pujol and I'm from Barcelona, Spain.
I am doing a research project on Bushido, and besides the books I have
about it, I can't find much information.
I've read in samuraihistory message search and I found a few things, but I would also like to know about Bushido nowadays.
Does somebody know a website(or any other place) where I can find more information?

Thank you in advance,

Xak.J.Pujol
